Note: Can fire a variety of Mortar Rounds (See Unusual Ammunition), is designed for the Siege Shell. If Firing an Anti-Plant, Smoke, or Starflare Rounds, add +2 to Blast or Smoke Radius Size, or an extra minute of illumination for starflares.
